rule:

input: Developers code daily. Testing ensures quality. Deployment happens often.
validityText:
The input is a paragraph of text. According to the input specification, the paragraph must contain at least three sentences. Upon evaluation, the input contains three sentences: "Developers code daily." "Testing ensures quality." and "Deployment happens often." Since the input meets the requirement of having at least three sentences, it complies with the input specification.

OK
coverageText:
```html

Developers code daily. Programming is a crucial skill they use to create applications, and they spend many hours refining their code.

Testing ensures quality. It is vital to identify bugs and enhance the functionality of software, and regular tests help maintain robust performance.

Deployment happens often, marking the transition from development to a live environment. It requires careful planning to ensure seamless integration and operation.

```
